snippet: The Spanish telecommunications giant Telefónica, which is seeking to reduce its heavy debt load, says it will raise around $2 billion through an initial public offering of its German business.
abstract: The Spanish telecommunications giant Telefónica, which is seeking to reduce its heavy debt load, says it will raise around $2 billion through an initial public offering of its German business.

headline.main: Telefonica Sets Terms for I.P.O. of German Unit
